data.title: Sharon A. Ling Award of Excellence
data.meta_description: Sharon A. Ling Award of Excellence
data.text:
Tara MacCrone, Manager for the Research Office, is the recipient of the 2023 Sharon A. Ling Award of Excellence for Outstanding Achievement by a Staff Member.

Staff form an integral part of the Western community. Staff members support the academic mission of Western, allowing faculty and students to devote much of their energy towards the search for truth and the application of knowledge. The University of Western Ontario recognizes the crucial role of staff. Western Engineering has been a leader in this regard. For several years now, we have offered staff recognition awards to honour the significant contributions of technical and administrative staff within our Faculty. These awards consist of a plaque and a prize, presented at the annual awards banquet.

In 2007, this award was renamed “The Sharon A. Ling Award of Excellence for Outstanding Achievement by a Staff Member” to honour and recognize Sharon Ling, a long-time staff member in the Department of Electrical & Computer Engineering. Sharon was a staff member who passionately dedicated her time and energy for the betterment of the Faculty.

Past recipients:

Samantha Roach - Director of Engineering Experiential Learning and Student Support, Dean’s Office (2022)

Karen Henry - Mechanical & Materials Engineering (2021)

Clare Tattersall - Manager, Undergraduate Services (2020)

Kristen Edwards - Civil & Environmental Engineering (2019)

Joanna Blom - Mechanical and Materials Engineering (2018)

Stephanie Tigert - Electrical & Computer Engineering (2017)

Claire Naudi - Mechanical & Materials Engineering (2016)

Katherine Manweiler - Engineering Finance and Stores (2015)

Sarah Williams - Dean's Office, Human Resources (2014)

Karen Norman - Boundary Layer Wind Tunner Laboratory (2013)
